title: Berlin Alexanderplatz Pt XII ( The Serpent In The Soul Of The Serpent)

sources.title: Berlin Alexanderplatz Pt Xii The Serpent In The Soul Of The Serpent
sources.description: Franz introduces Mieze to Meck. Reinhold blackmails Meck to set up a meeting for him with Mieze. Meck takes Mieze on a drive to Freienwalde and delivers her to Reinhold. Reinhold takes her for a walk in the woods, where she resists his advances. Mieze wants to know more about Franz, and Reinhold reveals it is because of him that Franz lost his arm. Mieze is horrified at this revelation. Reinhold strangles her and leaves her in the woods.
